column4:
大変だ！
小型の飛行オートマンだ！
column5:
This is bad!
There are little flying Automen!
column11:
It's bad!
There are small flying Automen!

column4:
数が多いんだ。
同時に襲いかかってきたら、
いくら/pでもヤバイ。
column5: There are loads of them. Even if /p can attack them simultaneously, it's gonna be tough!
column11:
There are loads of them.
Even if /p can attack them simultaneously, it's gonna be tough!

column4: フィン・ディー＿冷静な顔

どこかに、
コントロール装置があるはずよ。
column5: There must be a device controlling them somewhere.
column11: There must be a device controlling them somewhere.

column4: メリッサ＿ちょっとした驚き
フィン・ディー＿基本姿勢

小型オートマンの情報を
持ってきたのよ。
column5: I know a little bit about small-scale Automen.
column11: I know a little bit about small-sized Automen.

column4: フィン・ディー＿難色を示す

小型オートマンは、
数が多くてやっかいな相手よ。
column5: Because they come in swarms, they're very troublesome opponents.
column11: Because they come in swarms, they're quite troublesome opponents.

column5: But they still have weak points.
column11: But, they still have weak points.

column4:
情報によると、
小型オートマンは、
完全には自律していない。
column5: According to what I've heard, the small-sized Automen are not completely autonomous.
column11: According to what I've heard, the small-sized Automen are not completely autonomous.

column4:
どこかに、すべてを統括する
/c5コントロール装置/c3があるはず。
それを探しましょう。
column5: Somewhere, there should be a /c5control device/c3 connecting them all. We need to find it.
column11: Somewhere, there should be a /c5control device/c3 connecting them all. We need to find it.

column4: フィン・ディー＿冷静な顔

あれよ！
あれが、小型オートマンの
コントロール装置。
column5:
There!
That must be a remote controller.
column11:
There!
That must be one of the remote controls.
